contract_structure.preamble: CONTRATO DE ARRENDAMIENTO QUE CONSTITUYEN {lessor}, A QUIEN EN LO SUCESIVO SE LE DENOMINARÁ "EL ARRENDADOR" A FAVOR DE {lessee}, A QUIEN EN LO SUCESIVO SE LE DENOMINARÁ "EL ARRENDATARIO" SUJETÁNDOSE PARA ELLO LA TENOR DE LAS SIGUIENTES DECLARACIONES Y CLÁUSULAS:
contract_structure.signatures:
Así convenido y sabedores del valor, fuerza y alcance legales del contenido de este contrato, las partes lo firman por duplicado a los _____ días del mes de _____.

EL ARRENDADOR

EL ARRENDATARIO

declaration_templates.person_declaration: Declara ser persona física/moral con capacidad legal para contratar y obligarse en el presente contrato.
declaration_templates.capacity_declaration: Que cuenta con la capacidad legal y económica para la celebración de este contrato.

contract_structure.preamble: LEASE AGREEMENT BETWEEN {lessor}, HEREINAFTER REFERRED TO AS "THE LESSOR" AND {lessee}, HEREINAFTER REFERRED TO AS "THE LESSEE" SUBJECT TO THE FOLLOWING DECLARATIONS AND CLAUSES:
contract_structure.signatures:
So agreed and knowing the value, force and legal scope of the content of this contract, the parties sign it in duplicate on the _____ day of the month of _____.

THE LESSOR

THE LESSEE

declaration_templates.person_declaration: Declares to be a natural/legal person with legal capacity to contract and bind in this agreement.
declaration_templates.capacity_declaration: That has the legal and economic capacity for the execution of this contract.

contract_structure.preamble: LEASE AGREEMENT BETWEEN {lessor}, HEREINAFTER REFERRED TO AS "THE LESSOR" AND {lessee}, HEREINAFTER REFERRED TO AS "THE LESSEE" SUBJECT TO THE FOLLOWING DECLARATIONS AND CLAUSES:
contract_structure.signatures:
So agreed and knowing the value, force and legal scope of the content of this contract, the parties sign it in duplicate on the _____ day of the month of _____.

THE LESSOR

THE LESSEE

declaration_templates.capacity_declaration: That has the legal and economic capacity for the execution of this contract.
